ValidationRule.description: US-0007702 - DE VAT Change 31 December 2020 & Subsidy Calc Updates
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName='Deal_V1', TEXT(EBH_BusinessName__r.EBH_RegistrationCountry__c)='Germany', TEXT(EBH_Status__c)='Planned', EBH_DealStartDate__c <= DATEVALUE("2020-12-31"), EBH_DealEndDate__c > DATEVALUE("2020-12-31"), EBH_Subsidy__c > 0 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Due to a change in German VAT, subsidized deals cannot start and end during the change over period. Separate Deals must be created for the portion ending before and the portion ending after 1 January 2021.
